name: Find your way
description: "Find your way" is a third-person shooter in a wild west setting. You are in the Sayver City. For many years this city was a calm place of wild west. But now the gang of J.James that terrorized Great Plains comes to this place.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Процессор: Dual Core 2.5 Ghz Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Radeon HD 4670 (512 MB) / GeForce GT 430 (1024 MB) DirectX: Версии 10 Место на диске: 700 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Процессор: Dual Core 2.5 Ghz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Radeon R7 260X (2 GB) / GeForce GTX 550 Ti (1 GB) DirectX: Версии 10 Место на диске: 700 MB
